title: Another World Loner Doesn’t Need The Friend Feature - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Contracts   Guilds   Level System   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Multiple Transported Individuals   S*aves   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Sabaku Mirai   沙漠みらい
description:
In order to prevent the resurrection of the Demon King, high school students, Tsumugi and his friends were summoned to another world with their class.

They were told that in this world, there is a friend function called [Bonds-list], and by making a contract with others, their status will increase.

However, when Tsumugi makes a contract - for some reason, his status drops.

The ability given to him is [bond-eating], a meaningless one with no known effect.

Two and a half months later, Tsumugi left the royal castle and was as a lone adventurer, but he bought a slave that he needed to take the guild's rank advancement test.

That slave was a monster girl worth only 30 silver coins.>
